Msg_Normal:
congratulations
 You are in a great place now. Maintain healthy habits to maintain a healthy weight
Msg_Overweight: Don't look over it! It's time to take action to reach your target weight
Msg_Obese: It's time for change! You are at high risk for obesity-related diseases You should increase your physical activity and reduce calories slowly but surely
Msg_Underweight: You may need to consider ways to gain weight because your current weight may pose certain health risks.
